title: Riots stance versus reality
body:
"any champ can be played anywhere" 

Jungle Yuumi here I come

replies.body: I mean that is true. They don't make the claim it will play viably thou.  Dying to jungle camps and going 0-16-0 Is still playing.

I have learned that when Yuumi goes off to the river bush "to ward"...
It's actually because her jungler has arrived and you're about to get your shit stuffed.

Relevant Username.

The reality is that any champ _can_ be played anywhere, but it probably wont be optimal. Riot has hopefully never suggested otherwise.
